name: Mindful Meditation
text: You clear your mind of stress and emotion by focusing on calming breathing exercises.
benefit: For 24 hours after you meditate, you gain a +1 bonus on Will saving throws against charm, compulsion, emotion, and fear effects, and increase the Bluff DC to feint you and the Intimidate DC to demoralize you by +5. These bonuses increase by 1 for every 5 Hit Dice you have to a maximum increase of +4 at 20 Hit Dice.
text_zh: 你通过平静的吐纳练习来清除你脑内的焦虑与情绪。
benefit_zh: 在你冥想后的24小时内，你在对抗魅惑，胁迫，情绪和恐惧效果时，你的意志豁免获得+1加值，并且对你进行虚招的唬骗检定DC和挫败士气的威吓检定DC+5。这个加值每5HD+1，并在20HD时最大+4
